name: Zombie Carnage (itch) (John Ivess)
description:
Fight off the incoming zombies with reliable firearms in this action first-person shooter! One human. Five waves of zombies. Will you survive?

Zombie Carnage is a casual action FPS where you fight off the incoming waves of zombies with your firearms.

Find the game source code here.

CREDITS A game by John Ivess
  • Game Design, Programming, Sound Design, and Additional Level Design - John Ivess
  • Soundtrack - Andrew Sitkov
  • SFX - Krotos Audio
  • Additional SFX from freesound.org under CC0 license
